## SUGGESTED READING

### A community sourced list of publications to read

<br>
Papers are tagged depending on the specific workshop question(s) they address. If untagged, they provide useful context or tools that canâ€™t be unequivocally assigned to any of the questions. 

Transversal topics (can be associated to any of the 5 questions) 

In brackets, tags linking to papers below:

  +   Main reasons for (or against) the comparisons on the delivery of ES <b>[WHY]</b>
  +   Levels of geographical variation or spatial scales relevant for the comparison of ES <b>[WHERE]</b>
  +   The role of the temporal component in ES comparative analyses <b>[WHEN]</b>
  +   To identify a series of ES and a series of (their) indicators which may allow (or not) these comparisons <b>[WHAT]</b>
  +   Potential methodologies to make ES comparable <b>[HOW]</b>
